author: benjaminchodroff
content: We will make the EIP-4736 neutral to the collection method — and we have no intention to add this to the EIP text itself, because it would be a conflict. If anyone wants to use another method to collect the data, the CLWP would still “work”

author: benjaminchodroff
content: I hope we can convince the client teams to support the mechanism, but enabled by default will be unlikely - and frankly, not necessary. We just need a small group of willing volunteers to help the entire community.

author: benjaminchodroff
content: Kleros is used to absolve myself and the others from appearing to be the arbitrators in case of any dispute. It’s not perfect, but this is the best we could think of.
